##############
  Change Log
##############

==========
  Latest
==========

New Features
------------

* None.

Other Changes
-------------

* None.

Bugfixes
--------

* None.

======================
  0.1.11 (2024-09-25)
======================

New Features
------------

* None.

Other Changes
-------------

* Updates to documentation.
* Use ``__slots__`` to improve resource use and immutability.
* Use ``__all__`` to manage exports from module

Bugfixes
--------

* ``range()`` raises ``ValueError`` if argument value for step is ``0``.

======================
  0.1.10 (2024-09-23)
======================

New Features
------------

* None.

Other Changes
-------------

* Updates to documentation.

Bugfixes
--------

* None.

======================
  0.1.9 (2024-09-20)
======================

New Features
------------

* None.

Other Changes
-------------

* Updates to documentation.
* Added `MANIFEST.in` to make the build include the LICENSE file.

Bugfixes
--------

* None.

======================
  0.1.8 (2024-09-18)
======================

New Features
------------

* None.

Other Changes
-------------

* Minor updates to documentation.
* Added `py.typed` to support typing (see `PEP-561 <https://peps.python.org/pep-0561/#packaging-type-information>`_).

Bugfixes
--------

* None.

======================
  0.1.7 (2024-09-18)
======================

Initial release.
